Package com.compendium.core.db

Class Summary
DBAudit THIS CLASS IS CURRENTLY NOT USED AND THEREFORE ITS INTERFACE CANNOT BE GUARENTEED DBAudit defines the format for the saving audit information, for each record type, in the Audit table.
DBClone THIS CLASS IS CURRENTLY NOT USED AND THEREFORE ITS INTERFACE CANNOT BE GUARENTEED The DBClone class serves as the interface layer to the Clones table in the database
DBCode The DBCode class serves as the interface layer between the RCode objects and the Code table in the database.
DBCodeGroup The DBCodeGroup class serves as the interface layer between the CodeGroup data and the CodeGroup table in the database.
DBCodeNode The DBCodeNode class serves as the interface layer to the CodeNode table in the database for the relationship between Codes and Nodes in the datamodel.
DBExtendedNodeType THIS CLASS IS CURRENTLY NOT USED AND THEREFORE ITS INTERFACE CANNOT BE GUARENTEED The DBExtendedNodeType class serves as the interface layer between the ExtendedNodeType objects and the ExtendedNodeType table in the database.
DBExtendedTypeCode THIS CLASS IS CURRENTLY NOT USED AND THEREFORE ITS INTERFACE CANNOT BE GUARENTEED The DBExtendedTypeCode class serves as the interface layer to the ExtendedTypeCode table in the database for the relationship between ExtendedNodeTypes and Codes in the datamodel.
DBExternalConnection The DBExternalConnection class holds methods to interact with reconds in a Connections table of a Compendium database.
DBFavorite The DBFavorite class serves as the interface layer between the Favorites and the Favorite table in the database.
DBGroup THIS CLASS IS CURRENTLY NOT USED AND THEREFORE ITS INTERFACE CANNOT BE GUARENTEED The DBGroup class serves as the interface layer between the Group objects and the Group table in the database.
DBGroupCode The DBGroupCode class serves as the interface layer between the GroupCode data and the GroupCode table in the database.
DBLink The DBLink class serves as the interface layer between the RLink objects and the Link table in the database.
DBMediaIndex The DBMediaIndex class serves as the interface layer between the MediaIndex objects and the MediaIndex table in the database.
DBMeeting The DBMeeting class serves as the interface layer for the Meeting table in the database.
DBNode The DBNode class serves as the interface layer between the Node Services objects and the Node table in the database.
DBNodeUserState The DBNodeUserState class serves as the interface layer to the NodeUserState table in the database for the relationship between nodes states and the users in the datamodel.
DBPermission THIS CLASS IS CURRENTLY NOT USED AND THEREFORE ITS INTERFACE CANNOT BE GUARENTEED The DBPermission class serves as the interface layer between the Permission objects and the Permission table in the database.
DBReferenceNode The DBReferenceNode class serves as the interface layer to the ReferenceNode table in the database
DBSearch The DBSearch class serves as the interface layer to make queries and searches into the the database.
DBShortCutNode The DBShortCutNode class serves as the interface layer to the ShortCutNodes table in the database
DBSystem The DBSystem class holds methods to interact with the records in a System database table.
DBUser The DBUser class serves as the interface layer between the UserProfile objects and the User table in the database.
DBUserGroup THIS CLASS IS CURRENTLY NOT USED AND THEREFORE ITS INTERFACE CANNOT BE GUARENTEED The DBUserGroup class serves as the interface layer to the UserGroup table in the database for the relationship between Users and Groups in the datamodel.
DBViewLayer The DBViewLayer class serves as the interface layer between the ViewLayer class and the ViewLayer table in the database.
DBViewLink The DBViewLink class serves as the interface layer to the ViewLink table in the database for the relationship between Views and Links in the datamodel.
DBViewNode The DBViewNode class serves as the interface layer between the NodePosition objects and the ViewNode table in the database.
DBViewProperty The DBViewProperty class serves as the interface layer between the View Properties and the ViewProperty table in the database.
DBWorkspace The DBWorkspace class serves as the interface layer between the Workspaces and the Workspace table in the database.
